nodes.text: Chall Bekan was a Force-attuned Morseerian male who lived during the Galactic Civil War. As a leader, he had connections to the Galactic Empire's government on the planet Tatooine. Bekan maintained a network of alien agents, which he used to keep surveillance on both the crime lord Jabba the Hutt and the Alliance to Restore the Republic.
Bekan was a methane breather who wore an environment suit and a breath mask, both of which were worn by his species in low-methane environments.

Chall Bekan was created for 1998's Official Tournament Sealed Deck of Decipher's Star Wars Customizable Card Game. According to a Star Wars CCG fan site, Bekan's name is an anagram of the last name of Decipher game playtester Chuck Kallenbach.
